release.action: Upgraded to work with Norconex Committer 2.0.0 (won't work with older versions).
Document "id" is now referred as document "reference".
Can now retry on commit failures and specify a delay between retries.
Upgraded to Committer version 1.2.0 and refactored code accordingly. Upgraded Solr dependencies to 4.7.
"batchSize configuration option has been renamed to "queueSize". "solrBatchSize" configuration options has been renamed to "committerBatchSize".
Fixed OutOfMemory issue when using the Solr Committer with multiple threads.
Starting with this release, Norconex Solr Committer is open-source under GPL.
